    G

    GAME_OVER - Enum constant in enum class logic.gamesystem.TurnResult
    The player has been defeated; the game ends immediately.
    GameController - Class in logic.gamesystem
    Controls the overall game flow, coordinating interaction between the deck, turn system, player, and game logic.
    GameController(DeckPool) - Constructor for class logic.gamesystem.GameController
    Constructs a GameController using the given deck pool.
    GameLogic - Class in logic.gamesystem
    Central game state and progression manager.
    GameLogic.RewardInfo - Class in logic.gamesystem
    Simple value object describing reward composition presented to the player after special encounters (typically minibosses).
    gearSlot - Variable in class logic.gamesystem.GameLogic.RewardInfo
    Which gear slot the reward includes (SWORD/HELMET/SUIT/NONE).
    GearSlot - Enum Class in logic.gamesystem
    Enumeration of equippable gear slots available to the player.
    get(int) - Method in class logic.gamesystem.Hand
